hotels.title: Turkey Beachfront Bliss in Bodrum with Infinity Pool, Hammam & Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Set on the tranquil shores of the Aegean Sea, this refined retreat offers panoramic views over Bodrum’s turquoise bays and pine-clad hills. Wander the ancient streets of Bodrum town, where the Mausoleum at Halicarnassus and the medieval Castle of St. Peter await, or browse the boutiques and galleries of the marina district. Savour Mediterranean cuisine at the elegant rooftop restaurant, where local seafood and Turkish wines take centre stage. The hotel’s spa features hammams and serene treatment rooms, the private beach offers easy seaside access, while the infinity pool overlooks the glittering coastline.

hotels.title: Five-Star Bodrum Bliss with 12 World-Class Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Perched over Paradise Bay and the Aegean Sea is the sparkling Mandarin Oriental, Bodrum, a five-star resort in Turkey's famous resort town. Gourmands can't pass up a stay here with 12 incredible onsite restaurants including an exclusive seaside lounge and bar and Bodrum's most glamorous bar, Mandarin Bar. For a dose of relaxation, head to the two-tier day spa for a decadent spa treatment, luxurious hammams with private scrub rooms and outdoor cabanas with Aegan Sea views.

hotels.title: Türkiye Five-Star Bodrum Haven Overlooking the Aegean Sea
hotels.description: Standing high above sun-bleached cliffs is the five-star Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay Bodrum, an ultra-stylish Türkiye escape overlooking the dazzling Aegean Sea. The hotel offers iconic Kempinski luxury in Bodrum and is the perfect base for exploring the town’s many charms just a short drive away. Marvel at the Bodrum Amphitheater, sip arabica coffee at any of the town’s famously shell-pink, vine-hugged cafés or sip cocktails on sweeping golden sands. After a full day of exploration, the hotel’s seven extraordinary restaurants, two bars, world-class 5,550sqm spa or spectacular clifftop infinity pool await, ready to welcome you home.
